title: Chapel of Shandjit-Jheskemus
story: The chapel of Shandjit-Jheskemus is situated at the center of a lake. These days it is badly infested by rabbits, indifferent to the past of the place. The chapel of Shandjit-Jheskemus is a place of growth of a rare specie of herbs.

notes.text: A large door on the western wall.
A ticking gearwork apparatus, wails loudly when the lever is pulled.
A giant pile of rubble hides a scale mail and some gold.
A magic amulet hovering in the middle of the small chamber.
